articles.title: RuPaul’s Drag Race kicks off season 13 with goops and gags, courtesy of “The Pork Chop” - The A.V. Club

articles.title: Taylor Swift's BFF Claire Winter Kislinger shares a photo of the singer giving 2020 the finger - Daily Mail
articles.description: Taylor Swift's friend Clair Winter Kislinger shared a playful throwback photo of her singer friend flipping the bird at 2020 as they put it in the rearview mirror.
articles.content:
Taylor Swift said 2020 had been 'weird' as she looked forward to a brighter 2021.
But her friend Claire Winter Kislinger bid the cursed year a sharper goodbye early on January 1 with a Polaroid-styl… [+3318 chars]

articles.title: Exclusive: Prince Charles warns cancer at risk of becoming 'forgotten C' in Covid pandemic - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Writing for The Telegraph, the prince says the virus crisis has taken 'a devastating toll' on cancer services
articles.content:
One study estimated between 7,000 and 18,000 excess cancer deaths within the year because of Covid. 
The prince said receiving a cancer diagnosis, or going through treatment, could be among the most… [+1409 chars]

articles.author: Stevie Chick
articles.title: MF Doom: a hip-hop genius who built his own universe of poetry - The Guardian
articles.description: The underground rap icon, who has died aged 49, was a voice like no other, plundering and splicing pop culture to deliver wilful, elliptical lines
articles.content: It makes twisted sense that were only learning of the death of Daniel Dumile, better known as MF Doom, two months after his passing, with scant accompanying detail. An artist who thrived in the shado… [+7237 chars]
